messages.content:
how's this, what's a good title for the email? 
Salam Hanaa, David and Salih

Insha'allah everyone is having a beautiful Friday. This was a wonderful, and busy, week for me as I went through all the interviews, photos, trainings, and connections I made during my work on this contract and I wanted to thank you for your willingness to collaborate and trust in me.

Especially thanks to Salih for guiding me through many of the intricacies of working in Mosul and keeping me accountable, and Hanaa for guiding me through the intricacies of working with the ITC and helping me dream.

You can find the folder for the deliverable for outcome 3 here: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1eC4YqY1KOF3ecYLI-HXfRJN4lsXbmaiN

In it you will find a file that describes the compiled content along side the main three deliverables:
The Activity Report: https://docs.google.com/document/d/11lp4yq6nUGP7A2B0zqrnakAeFknJ1qWuGHZEfT3iQbM/edit?usp=sharing
The Sustainability Plan: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YWge26FWT3wo95EU1exAp4yewrTJ-K-vGol8DCZe8wM/edit?usp=sharing
And the Internship / Apprenticeship / Job-Shadowing Framework: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WGDcilh1tJPbI0Wo_jSh5UAubM832zaXojRuSU128m0/edit?usp=sharing

Thank you again for the continued trust and support and I hope these documents are well recieved. 

If you need any addendums or ammendments I am at your disposal. 
Salam
+Bilal Ghalib

Love the tone—warm, grateful, and clear. I’d just tighten a few spots, fix typos, and make the links scannable.

# Subject line ideas
- Outcome 3 Deliverables: Activity Report, Sustainability Plan & Apprenticeship Framework  
- Deliverables for Outcome 3 — Reports & Framework Inside  
- ITC Mosul | Outcome 3 Package (Activity Report, Sustainability Plan, Apprenticeships)  
- Outcome 3 Compiled Deliverables — Thank you & next steps  

# Polished email (copy/paste)
Salam Hanaa, David, and Salih,

Insha’Allah you’re having a beautiful Friday. This week I compiled the interviews, photos, trainings, and connections from this contract, and I wanted to thank you for the trust and collaboration.

Special thanks to Salih for guiding me through the intricacies of working in Mosul and keeping me accountable, and to Hanaa for navigating ITC processes and helping me dream.

All Outcome 3 deliverables are here:  
Folder: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1eC4YqY1KOF3ecYLI-HXfRJN4lsXbmaiN

Included:
- **Activity Report:** https://docs.google.com/document/d/11lp4yq6nUGP7A2B0zqrnakAeFknJ1qWuGHZEfT3iQbM/edit?usp=sharing  
- **Sustainability Plan:** https://docs.google.com/document/d/1YWge26FWT3wo95EU1exAp4yewrTJ-K-vGol8DCZe8wM/edit?usp=sharing  
- **Internship/Apprenticeship/Job-Shadowing Framework:** https://docs.google.com/document/d/1WGDcilh1tJPbI0Wo_jSh55UAubM832zaXojRuSU128m0/edit?usp=sharing

If anything needs clarification, addenda, or amendments, I’m at your disposal.

Shukran and salam,  
Bilal Ghalib  
+ [phone]

---

Tiny notes:
- “well **received**” (not “recieved”)  
- “addenda or **amendments**” covers both additions and changes  
- Listing the links as bullets improves scan-ability.  
- If there’s a review deadline, add one line: “If possible, please share any edits by **[date]**.”
